site_url.description: The URL of the site for which the search analytics data is recorded.

search_type.description: The type of search (e.g., web search, image search) that generated the analytics data.

date.description: The date for which the search analytics data is recorded.

country.description: The country from which the search originated.

device.description: The type of device used by the user during the search (e.g., desktop, mobile).

query.description: The search query used by the user to find the site in search results.

clicks.description: The number of times users clicked on the search result linking to the site.

impressions.description: The number of times the site was shown in search results to users.

ctr.description: Click-through rate represents the percentage of users who clicked on the site's link after seeing it in search results.

position.description: The average ranking position of the site in search results.
